subject: French Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Andy Roddick, the 2003 United States Open champion, lost to 88th-ranked Nicolas Mahut of France, exiting in the first round of a Grand Slam tournament for the first time since 2007.
snippet: Andy Roddick, the 2003 United States Open champion, lost to 88th-ranked Nicolas Mahut of France, exiting in the first round of a Grand Slam tournament for the first time since 2007.
